thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 09 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sentient IV Buys Securities Of Tinka Resources Limited

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sentient IV Buys Securities Of Tinka Resources Limited
text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Sentient IV:
* SENTIENT IV ACQUIRES SECURITIES OF TINKA RESOURCES LIMITED
* SENTIENT EXECUTIVE GP IV SAYS ACQUIRED CONTROL OVER 7.3 MILLION UNITS OF TINKA RESOURCES LIMITED AT A PRICE OF $0.48 PER UNIT
* SENTIENT EXECUTIVE GP IV SAYS HAS CONTROL OVER 62.7 MILLION TINKA SHARES, REPRESENTING ABOUT 24.7% OF OUTSTANDING TINKA SHARES
* SENTIENT EXECUTIVE GP IV SAYS ALSO HAS RIGHT TO ACQUIRE 7.1 MILLION TINKA SHARES THROUGH 7.1 MILLION COMMON SHARE PURCHASE WARRANTS ISSUED BY TINKA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
